title: Paris-Nice: Jonas Vingegaard Crashes and Loses Yellow Jersey to Matteo Jorgenson
content:
Post-stage images captured Vingegaard grimacing in pain as he tried to remove his gloves and journalists reported that he broke down into tears, suggesting that the injury could be serious.

Read the full article at Paris-Nice: Jonas Vingegaard Crashes and Loses Yellow Jersey to Matteo Jorgenson on Velo.
author: ahood
